definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment

sentences.english: Is it really true you let Nick play video games for hours if he wants?
sentences.chinese: 只要尼克想玩电玩，你就真的让他玩上好几小时吗？
动漫电玩节共吸引了170家参展商。

sentences.english: My mom thinks video games are a social malady.
sentences.chinese: 我妈妈认为电玩是股社会歪风。

sentences.english: Select the difficulty level, pick up your guns, do a quick video gunman.
sentences.chinese: 选择难度级别，拿起你的枪，去做个电玩快枪手。

sentences.english: They learn better computer skills by playing video games.
sentences.chinese: 他们打电玩会学到更多的计算机知识。

sentences.english: Person of Mr Cheng belt goes report plays a city to denounce a view, the result meets with threaten instead minatory .
sentences.chinese: 程先生带人去电玩城讨说法，结果反遭一顿恐吓威胁。

sentences.english: No more than thirty minutes or an hour of video games per day.
sentences.chinese: 一天打电玩不超过半小时或一小时。

sentences.english: I'm not allowed to play computer games on weeknights.
sentences.chinese: 星期一到星期五晚上我不可以打电玩。

sentences.english: The Internet is really appealing. Many students are addicted to playing games in Internet cafes .
sentences.chinese: 网路真的很吸引人，许多学生沉溺于在网咖里打电玩。

sentences.english: I've just visited the video game exhibition and everything is fine regarding our booth.
sentences.chinese: 我刚去过电玩展的现场，我们摊位很顺利。

definition: table tennis/table tennis ball (Tw)/billiards/pool/snooker (HK, Singapore, Malaysia)
toy in a capsule (dispensed from a vending machine)
